content: That's really helpful, thanks! I think I'll try the Cetaphil Moisturizing Cream as an additional moisturizer. I've heard great things about it, and it seems like it would complement the Dr. Jart+ set well. By the way, I'm really interested in skincare because my sister's been raving about the luxury skincare set I got her from La Mer, which cost around $1,000. Her skin looks amazing, and I want to try out some similar products that won't break the bank.
